title: Deceptively Delicious
excerpt: Videogaming-related online strip by Mike Krahulik and Jerry Holkins. Includes news and commentary.
text: July 23, 2025 Deceptively Delicious Lego already had us dialed in, so launching an onslaught like a Soundwave - let alone a Soundwave with a talky bit is the kind of virulent attack that kills the host too soon, necessitating a Lego coffin. It's rude, but also kind of awesome, like The Sex Pistols. I would also like to thank you preemptively for enduring what may be the dumbest punchline of all time. That is, if you did endure it. If you were annihilated by it, there may be some gift options for your family in the first paragraph. Very, very near the end. (CW)TB out.
html:
July 23, 2025

Deceptively Delicious

Lego already had us dialed in, so launching an onslaught like a Soundwave - let alone a Soundwave with a talky bit is the kind of virulent attack that kills the host too soon, necessitating a Lego coffin. It's rude, but also kind of awesome, like The Sex Pistols.

I would also like to thank you preemptively for enduring what may be the dumbest punchline of all time. That is, if you did endure it. If you were annihilated by it, there may be some gift options for your family in the first paragraph. Very, very near the end.

(CW)TB out.
